name: ahau
description: Desktop and mobile applications for gathering and sharing whakapapa (family trees, traditional knowledge). Built using Scuttlebutt

scripts.setup:mobile: cd mobile && npm i && npm run setup
scripts.dev:web: npm run dev:mobile-server & npm run dev:ui
scripts.dev:ui: kill-port 8080 && cd ui && npm run dev
scripts.dev:desktop: npm run dev:ui & cd desktop && npm run start:dev
scripts.release:desktop: npm run build-ui:desktop && cd desktop && npm run dist && cd .. && npm run move-release:desktop
scripts.postinstall: cd ui && npm i && cd ../server && npm i
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ui
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf **/node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf **/package-lock.json
